channel.title: Accused me of cheating
channel.description:
I was a evil king
Somone accused me of cheating Cause I played perfectly exes the pally puts somone claimed sheriff in DN
Then I say the butler claimed it
Decided fate
Executed another
And he was like you must of cheated cause how did you know I wasn't cult when I said you claimed butler

item.title: Accused me of cheating
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I am still in the game and the reaper reaped him self LUL

Read full topic

item.title: Accused me of cheating
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
That comes with all deception games. For example,when I know I’m about to die and I’m evil, I just spill every bean and act completely insane. That happens with every game I’m in, and no doubt some people have a need to accuse everyone who plays better than them of cheating in every game. Every player has a pattern.

Read full topic
